name: Caladria Chronicles
description: Caladria Chronicles is a kinetic visual novel spanning several genres, complete with full voice acting. Follow princess Nerisu Himenomiya and her friends as they enjoy life, have crazy adventures, and maybe even save the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP1 Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated chipset Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any audio output
